import React, {Component} from 'react' import ApiRepository from '../Library/ApiRepositories' import store from '../Services/ReduxServices/ReduxStore'; import { stat } from 'fs'; class BLOG extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ create: { meta_title: null, meta_description: null, meta_image: null, meta_keyword: null, status: null, title: null, content: null, slug: null, authored_by: null, authored_on: null, }, read: { id: null }, update: { id: null, meta_title: null, meta_description: null, meta_image: null, meta_keyword: null, status: null, title: null, content: null, slug: null, authored_by: null, authored_on: null, }, distroy: { id: null } } console.clear() } handleCreateChange(e) { this.setState({ create: Object.assign( {}, this.state.create, { [e.target.name]: e.target.value } ) }) } handleUpdateChange(e) { this.setState({ update: Object.assign( {}, this.state.update, { [e.target.name]: e.target.value } ) }) } async GetBLOG(event) { event.preventDefault(); var id = ([event.target.name] == "fetch-single")? this.state.read.id : '' const response = await ApiRepository.GetBLOG(id); if(response){ console.log(JSON.stringify(response)) document.getElementById('get-response').innerHTML = JSON.stringify(response) } else{ alert('Something Went Wrong'); } } async CreateBLOG(event) { event.preventDefault(); var state = this.state.create const postData = { title: state.title, url: state.url, parent: state.parent, status: state.status, sortby: state.sortby } const response = await ApiRepository.CreateBLOG(postData); if(response){ window.location.reload(false); document.getElementById('create-response').innerHTML = JSON.stringify(response) } else{ alert('Something went wrong ?'); } } async UpdateBLOG(event) { event.preventDefault(); var state = this.state.update console.log(state) var id = state.id const postData = { title: state.title, url: state.url, parent: state.parent, status: state.status, sortby: state.sortby } const response = await ApiRepository.UpdateBLOG(id, postData); if(response){ document.getElementById('update-response').innerHTML = JSON.stringify(response) } else{ alert('Something went wrong ?'); } } async DistroyBLOG(event) { event.preventDefault(); var id = ([event.target.name] == "delete-single")? this.state.distroy.id : '' const response = await ApiRepository.DistroyBLOG(id); if(response){ console.log(JSON.stringify(response)) document.getElementById('delete-response').innerHTML = JSON.stringify(response) } else{ alert('Something Went Wrong'); } } render(){ return (
{/*------------------------ START ------------------------ */}
{/*------------------------ CREATE ------------------------ */}
Create
this.CreateBLOG(event)}> id meta_title meta_description meta_image meta_keyword status title content slug authored_by authored_on created_at updated_at
this.handleCreateChange(e)} required autoComplete="title" autoFocus />
this.handleCreateChange(e)} required autoComplete="url" autoFocus />
this.handleCreateChange(e)} required autoComplete="sortby" autoFocus />
{/*------------------------ UPDATE ------------------------ */}
Update
this.UpdateBLOG(event)}>
this.handleUpdateChange(e)} required autoComplete="id" autoFocus />
this.handleUpdateChange(e)} required autoComplete="title" autoFocus />
this.handleUpdateChange(e)} required autoComplete="url" autoFocus />
this.handleUpdateChange(e)} required autoComplete="sortby" autoFocus />
{/*------------------------ DELETE ------------------------ */}
Delete
this.DistroyBLOG(event)}>
this.setState({distroy: {id: event.target.value}})} required autoComplete="id" autoFocus />
this.DistroyBLOG(event)}>
{/*------------------------ READ ------------------------ */}
Read
this.GetBLOG(event)}>
this.setState({read: {id: event.target.value}})} required autoComplete="id" autoFocus />
this.GetBLOG(event)}>
{/*------------------------ End ------------------------ */}
) } } export default BLOG
